mapper.sql: /* commonSearchColumns */ qa.no AS "no", qa.content AS content, qa.file_name AS fileName, qa.file_path AS filePath, qa.file_size AS fileSize, qa.created AS created, qa.lastmodified AS lastModified

/* procSearch */
AND q.classification LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND q.title LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND q.user_id LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND (q.classification LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') OR q.title LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') OR q.user_id LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%'))
AND 1=1
AND q.created >= STR_TO_DATE(#{searchStartDate}, '%Y/%m/%d %h:%i:%s')
AND ADDDATE(STR_TO_DATE(#{searchEndDate}, '%Y/%m/%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY ) > q.created
AND q.status = #{searchTypeStatus}
AND 1=1
mapper.select:
/* SupportQnA.getQnAList */ SELECT /*(row_number() over(order by q.created )) AS rowNum,*/ q.no AS no, q.title AS title, (SELECT cd.value FROM portaldb.code_detail cd WHERE cd.key = q.classification AND cd.group_id = 'QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION') AS classificationValue, q.classification, q.created AS created, q.user_id AS userId, q.status AS status, (SELECT cd.value FROM portaldb.code_detail cd WHERE cd.key = q.status AND cd.group_id = 'QUESTION_STATUS') AS statusValue FROM portaldb.question q WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY q.created DESC

/* SupportQnA.getQuestion */ SELECT , qa.title AS title, (SELECT cd.value FROM portaldb.code_detail cd WHERE cd.key = qa.classification AND cd.group_id = 'QUESTION_CLASSIFICATION') AS classificationValue, qa.classification AS classification, qa.user_id AS userId, qa.status AS status FROM portaldb.question qa WHERE 1=1 AND qa.no = #{no}
/* SupportQnA.getAnswer */ SELECT , qa.question_no AS questionNo, qa.answerer AS answerer FROM portaldb.answer qa WHERE 1=1 AND qa.question_no = #{questionNo}

/* SupportQnA.getMyQuestionsInMyAccount */ SELECT q.no AS "no", q.title AS title, q.user_id AS userId, q.content AS content, q.status AS status, q.file_path AS filePath, q.created AS created, q.lastmodified AS lastModified FROM portaldb.question q WHERE q.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY q.lastmodified DESC LIMIT 3 OFFSET 0
mapper.insert: /* SupportQnA.insertMyQuestion */ INSERT INTO portaldb.question ( title, classification, user_id, content, cell_phone, status, file_name, file_path, file_size, created, lastmodified) VALUES ( #{title}, #{classification}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{cellPhone}, #{status}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, now(), now());
mapper.update:
/* SupportQnA.updateMyQuestion */ UPDATE portaldb.question SET
title = #{title},
classification = #{classification},
content = #{content},
cell_phone = #{cellPhone},
status = #{status},
file_name = #{fileName}, file_path = #{filePath}, file_size = #{fileSize}, lastModified = now() WHERE `no` = #{no}
